name: Santa's Giftship Reloaded
description:
Help Santa and the elves save Christmas!!

The first #NotMySanta protesters showed up just as St. Nick repealed the old “minimum elfiness” requirements, and things have gotten steadily worse. Now a growing group of angry elves deceived by Krampus, Santa’s evil twin, are attempting to shut down Christmas! Early reports are coming in of elf operatives aligning with dissenters nearing Santa's workshop. Reinforcements are headed to the scene as well but will it be soon enough? Will the children be left with nothing but coal?! It is up to you to help Santa save Christmas. Elf Suit up! Don’t let these evil forces choose a counterfeit and prevail with their cries.

The critics of the controversial Frostmaster BL19 Sleigh will be eating crow tomorrow...
- SEE the CC-9000 Peppermint Chain-gun
- HEAR the 130mm Snowball SAW
- FEEL the ground pounding Coal Cannon BFC-22Bravo

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to man the blazing guns on Santa's sleigh as makes a last ditch effort to keep the workshop running and the gifts on schedule. Saving Christmas is up to you - will you gun the sleigh tonight?

And while you're saving Christmas
-Amazing magical north pole art will give you warm fuzzies as you blaze your way to Christmas Eve.
-No actual elves, reindeer, Santa relatives were harmed in the making of this game.

If you love Zombie Gunship or any of those other AC130 games, then this game will be kinda OK.
